title: Heathen (The Rays)
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
Steel on the skyline
Sky made of glass
Made for a real world
All things must pass
[Verse 2]
Waiting for something
Looking for someone
Is there no reason?
Have I stared too long?
[Refrain]
Whoa
Whoa
[Bridge]
You say you'll leave me
And when the sun is low
And the rays high
I can see it now
I can feel it die
[Refrain]
Oh (whoa)
Oh (whoa)
